scripts.dev:up: cd .. && docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d --build
scripts.dev:down: cd .. && docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml down
scripts.prod:up: cd .. && docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d --build
scripts.prod:down: cd .. && docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml down
scripts.logs:dev: cd .. && docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f
scripts.logs:prod: cd .. && docker compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml logs -f
